headline: Delta Fleet Renewal Reshapes Long Haul Strategy And Investor Trade Offs
summary: Delta Air Lines (NYSE:DAL) announces a major long term fleet renewal, including new widebody jet orders from both Airbus and Boeing. The company plans to add next generation aircraft aimed at supporting international route growth and improving fuel efficiency. The order commitments represent a multi year investment that is expected to shape Delta’s global network and capacity planning. Delta is one of the largest global carriers, with a business built around premium corporate travel, a...

headline: A Look At Delta Air Lines (DAL) Valuation After Oil Price Spike Pressures Airline Stocks
summary: The latest move in Delta Air Lines (DAL) stock was driven by a sharp rise in crude oil prices after U.S. Iran nuclear talks stalled, which pushed airline shares lower on renewed jet fuel cost concerns. See our latest analysis for Delta Air Lines. While the latest 6.82% one day share price decline to US$65.70 reflects a jump in perceived fuel cost risk, the 1 year total shareholder return of 10.62% and very strong 3 year total shareholder return of 74.30% suggest longer term holders have still...
